T11D4220-2:282a-44: cha tsam bdag gis bshad pas mi g-yo shin tu brtan pa'i bsod nams skyes thob pa //
T11D4220-2:282a-45: des ni sems can tshogs 'di srid pa gsum pa'i rgya mtsho dag las yongs drangs nas //
T11D4220-2:282a-46: tshangs sogs kyis kyang thob min sangs rgyas go 'phang dri med rtag tu thob par shog //
T11D4220-2:282a-47: bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi zhabs sgom pa /
T11D4220-2:282a-48: slob dbon sh'akya'i blos sbyar ba tshad ma rnam 'grel gyi 'grel bshad rdzogs so /
